body.name: Gentle Cleanser, Lightly Foaming Gel Face Wash, Sensitive Skin Care, Fragrance Free, 5.07 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 1 min
features: GENTLE FACE CLEANSER – Lightly foaming daily facial cleansing gel that soothes as it cleanses, while keeping your skin barrier balanced
SOOTHES & BALANCES – Formulated with soothing oat extract to calm dry skin without stripping skin of healthy oils or clogging pores

LEVEL UP YOUR ROUTINE – Designed for those with sensitive, combination, oily or spot prone skin to use morning and night. Perfect for men, women, teens, or anyone looking to complement their existing routine
CLEAN & VEGAN FORMULA – Dermatologist-designed, fragrance-free, sulfate-free and paraben-free, 100% vegan, cruelty-free skincare, Leaping Bunny Certified
CUROLOGY – Dermatologist founded, developed, and tested

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used the Curology Rx products for a while now and love that I can get the non-Rx at Amazon! This is a great cleanser; very gentle but does a good job and leaves my skin feeling clean and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great, smells great
reviews.reviewText: Love this face wash! It's a gel cleanser so it's not super thick, but it feels great and washes off easily without leaving my skin feeling dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gentle Cleanser that gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: This takes off my makeup well, but doesn’t strip my skin. It’s great to clean makeup brushes with also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser is so good. It’s really lightweight, gentle and foams up nicely. I feel like it cleans my face so well without stripping it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cleanses well, but has a slight and weird smell
reviews.reviewText: I prefer fragrance free products in general, so a fragrance free cleanser was promising. However this cleanser does have a slight, off-putting smell. It's a bit unpleasant to make me want to wash my face with. Once you're able to get past the fragrance, the cleanser itself works well. It's gentle as advertised, but does a good job of cleaning my face after a day at work. It doesn't foam but does remove oils and dirt from my skin. Also, I haven't had any side effects since using this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great everyday cleanser
reviews.reviewText: Amazed by the quality of the Curology gentle cleanser. I hate the tight skin feeling I get from most cleansers. This leaves the skin so soft and clean feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, gentle cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I tend to think of Curology as a brand for teens with acne (which BTW isn't exactly true- they also offer ant aging skincare as well), so even though this cleanser is labeled "gentle", I figured it would be too drying for my dehydrated skin. Not so! I found this to be very gentle, and a through cleanser without stripping my skin. While labeled as a "lightly foaming face wash", I didn't really get foam from it- and that is fine by me. I just want clean skin that isn't dried out, and this delivered on that front. For me, this cleanser hits all the important aspects: it didn't cause my skin to react, it didn't dry my skin out, it effectively removes physical sunscreen, it has no scent, it's easy to use, and it comes at a very affordable price point. I had never tried Curology products before being offered the chance to try this out, and didn't know a lot about them. In doing a little online research, it appears that they are trying to cater to a wider audience than just teens for skin care. After using this cleanser, I have to say that I am impressed. I highly recommend this cleanser for sensitive or dry/dehydrated skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very decent wash
reviews.reviewText: This is a good face wash, it's a little foamy and lather well, takes off the impurities without stripping my face and leaving it dry, there has been no allergic reactions, it leaves my face smooth, the scent is a little off but it doesn't linger. A good product for it's price, with so many similar products going for 3 times more this is very affordable.
